name: Android Police Material Dark
description: Dark theme for Android Police with Material styling. Content is the focus - this means no distractions like polls, sidebars, etc. Disqus theming available.
additional_info:
Release Notes
-----------------

v1.0

- Initial release

v1.1

- Expand image on hover
- Enforce max image size for consistency

v1.2

- More images expandable
- Other smaller fixes

v1.2.1

- Text color fixes
